channel.title: ASX:FMG on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in ASX:FMG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Fortescue’s Profit Tumbles 41% But Keeps Green-Tech Focus
item.description: Fortescue Ltd.’s full-year profit fell 41% on lower prices for its iron ore, as Chinese demand for the steelmaking ingredient weakens amid its protracted property-sector slowdown.
